original_text: Can that which is unsavoury be eaten without salt? or is there any taste in the white of an egg?
korean_text: 싱거운 것이 소금 없이 먹히겠느냐 닭의 알 흰자위가 맛이 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Can that which is unsavoury be eaten
sentences.korean_translation: 맛이 없는 것을 먹을 수 있습니까

sentences.original_text: in the white of an egg?
